ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Sneak Peek joins a team heading into Darklonia to meet up with the resistance; the resistance leader turns out to be Sneak Peek's old flame Katya. Cobra arrests Wade and his wife but Heather escapes. Storm Shadow recalls a time when Snake Eyes was driven to wrath. Cobra Commander holds a meeting with Destro and tries to assassinate him but fails; Destro advises Cobra Commander not to try that again.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 16:50:54. [CVDB589691] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:53. [Issue ID 1688605]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Royale,Juan Fernandez,S.L. Gallant
